do-you-have.question: Do you have a passport application reference number?
do-you-have.with-reference: Yes, I have my reference number
do-you-have.without-reference: No, I don't have my reference number

receipt-1-will-find.text: On a receipt where the file number is circled you will find:

list.item-1: statement to remind individuals to please present this pickup slip and personal identification.
personal appearance of applicant required, or
list.item-2: I authorize (insert name of person) to pick up my Travel Document. Authorized person must be over 16 years of age and must show personal identification.

item-2.text: there are 2 checkboxes (you must check one):

list.item-4: statement to remind individuals to please ensure your passport is picked up within 30 days.

receipt-2-pickup-instructions.text: At the bottom of the receipt, there are also pickup instructions:

list.item-1: title of receipt: official receipt and pick-up slip

receipt-2-will-find.text: On a receipt where the file number is circled you will find:

list.item-1: statement to indicate that the application has been received
list.item-2: instructions for the next steps on processing the passport
list.item-3: statement to indicate that the passport will be mailed to the provided mailing address

receipt-3-next-steps.text: At the bottom of the receipt, there are instructions for next steps and delivery:

list.item-2: name and address of the passport office

receipt-3-will-find.text: On an official receipt where the reference number is circled you will find:

receipt-image-1.alt: An example of an official receipt. The file number is circled in the centre of the receipt.
receipt-image-1.descriptive-text: An example of an official receipt. The file number is circled in the centre of the receipt.
receipt-image-1.title: Example receipt 1

receipt-image-2.alt: An example of an official receipt and pick-up slip. The file number is circled in the upper left-hand side of the receipt, above a barcode.
receipt-image-2.descriptive-text: An example of an official receipt and pick-up slip. The file number is circled in the upper left-hand side of the receipt, above a barcode.
receipt-image-2.title: Example receipt 2

receipt-image-3.alt: An example of an official receipt. The reference number is circled in the middle of the receipt, above a barcode.
receipt-image-3.descriptive-text: An example of an official receipt. The reference number is circled in the middle of the receipt, above a barcode.
receipt-image-3.title: Example receipt 3

where-to-find.header: Where to find your reference number

applied-by-mail.text: If you applied for your passport by mail, you will need to <Link>request your reference number</Link>. We will email the reference number to you.

applied-in-person.text: If you applied for your passport in person, the reference number can be found on the receipt you were given. Here are some examples of receipts, and where they contain the reference number:

if-lost.header: If you lost your reference number
if-lost.text: If you lost or misplaced your reference number, you will need to <Link>request your reference number</Link>. We will email the reference number to you.
